coreEuropean.notes: Manually curated subset for EN, FR, DE, ES, IT

globalDiverse.source: NSM Publications (Goddard, Wierzbicka, Onishi, Yoon, Ye, et al.)
globalDiverse.notes:
""
            Complete 65-prime inventory with 11 language families for polyglot triangulation.
            Languages: en, fr, de, es, zh (Mandarin), ja, ar, ko, ms (Malay), pl, ru.
            Primary sources: Goddard & Wierzbicka (2014) NSM Chart; Onishi (1994) Japanese primes;
            Yoon (2000-2003) Korean primes; Ye (various) Chinese primes.
            ""
